metadata.description: Public Marketplace for Stonefish Labs plugins

plugins.name: agentic-dev-fastmcp-dev
plugins.description: FastMCP development toolkit with end-to-end skills for server creation, upgrades, architecture, safety, and testing.

plugins.name: agentic-dev-lexy
plugins.description: General-purpose local knowledge base search plugin with exact, BM25, and fuzzy retrieval pipelines.

plugins.name: agentic-dev-local-llm-prompt-evaluator
plugins.description: Evaluate prompts, system prompts, and agent workflows for local LLM reliability with scored findings and concrete rewrites.

plugins.name: agentic-dev-mp-admin
plugins.description: Marketplace management skills: init, add, remove, sync, and publish for Claude Code plugin marketplaces.

plugins.name: agentic-dev-mp-dev
plugins.description: Plugin development tools: scaffold skills, agents, hooks, MCP servers, commands, and plugins; validate and refine components; publish to GitHub.

plugins.name: agentic-dev-tts-ipa-pronunciation
plugins.description: Review TTS scripts and replace pronunciation-sensitive words with IPA where needed to improve voice-model pronunciation while preserving script meaning and flow.

plugins.name: cloud-apple-calendar
plugins.description: FastMCP 3.x server for Apple Calendar integration on macOS.

plugins.name: cloud-apple-reminders
plugins.description: FastMCP 3.x server for Apple Reminders integration on macOS.

plugins.name: cloud-findmy
plugins.description: Apple Find My MCP server for device tracking and account-safe cache management.

plugins.name: cloud-google-maps
plugins.description: Google Maps MCP server for geocoding, places, directions, and distance calculations.

plugins.name: cloud-mac-messages
plugins.description: FastMCP 3.x server for macOS Messages search, contact lookup, and guarded message sending with profile-based confirmation policy.

plugins.name: cloud-sandals
plugins.description: MCP server plugin for Sandals and Beaches resort discovery, live availability, and optional price watch alerts.

plugins.name: dev-github-publish
plugins.description: Publish projects to GitHub cleanly with repository setup, .gitignore strategy, README baselines, topics, and push workflows.

plugins.name: dev-intellidiff
plugins.description: Compare files and folders, detect duplicates, find differences, and read specific line ranges with normalization options.

plugins.name: dev-project-management
plugins.description: Project management bundle for Stonefish-Labs containing skills and commands for project briefing, bootstrap, retrospectives, and more.

plugins.name: dev-retro
plugins.description: Extract a structured retrospective from chat history, session history, planning files, or selected files and folders.

plugins.name: dev-snippets-python-utilities
plugins.description: Python utility snippets for keyring-backed secrets, HTML-to-Markdown conversion, and sync/async compatibility patterns.

plugins.name: legacy-journal-anchor-year-method
plugins.description: Guide users through the Anchor Year Method to uncover rich autobiographical memories for legacy journals, memoirs, and personal history interviews.

plugins.name: lifestyle-jefit
plugins.description: MCP server plugin for JEFit workout history and per-session exercise analysis.

plugins.name: lifestyle-myfitnesspal
plugins.description: MCP server plugin for MyFitnessPal nutrition, meals, exercise, and hydration summaries.

plugins.name: lifestyle-people-coaching
plugins.description: Structured coaching and reflective prompt plugin covering manager coaching, challenge prompts, talent discovery, and guardrailed introspection.

plugins.name: media-fb-reel-downloader
plugins.description: Download public Facebook reels/videos to local MP4 files.

plugins.name: media-image-crop-rotate
plugins.description: Image processing plugin for cropping to center and rotating 90° clockwise.

plugins.name: meme-aidoomd
plugins.description: Doom map design and QA plugin with skills for consultation, IR generation, and validation plus an independent reviewer agent.

plugins.name: meme-tetris-guideline-compliance
plugins.description: Single-player Tetris 2009 guideline skill pack with deterministic compliance reviewer and scoring rubric.

plugins.name: meme-waffle-house-callout
plugins.description: Turn any input into a funny Waffle House-style Pull Drop Mark kitchen callout.

plugins.name: prosvc-humanizer
plugins.description: Remove signs of AI-generated writing from text to produce more natural, human-written prose.

plugins.name: prosvc-research-intelligence
plugins.description: Research-to-decision workflow plugin combining deep research, strict technical editing, and executive summary synthesis with structured subagent contracts.

plugins.name: sec-code-forensics
plugins.description: Security-focused codebase reconnaissance plugin with structured OWASP-mapped findings and a dedicated forensic analysis subagent.

plugins.name: sec-dev-snippets-lowlevel-security
plugins.description: Defensive low-level security and forensics snippets with deny-by-default guardrails, routing, and safety review agents.

plugins.name: sys-linux-dev-snippets-linux-bash
plugins.description: Linux and Bash snippet workflows for resilient downloads and ELF dependency packaging with verification and rollback guidance.

plugins.name: sys-linux-disable-sleep-ubuntu
plugins.description: Disable or enable sleep, suspend, hibernate, and hybrid-sleep on Ubuntu systems using systemctl.

plugins.name: sys-macos-battery-charging-check
plugins.description: Check charging state, detected adapter wattage, and live power events on macOS.

plugins.name: sys-macos-demacify
plugins.description: Strip macOS metadata files from directories before archiving, sharing, or transferring to non-Mac systems.

plugins.name: sys-macos-device-display-diagnostics
plugins.description: Peripheral and monitor diagnostics covering USB, Bluetooth, and display state.

plugins.name: sys-macos-external-ip
plugins.description: Explicit outbound public-IP lookup skill with multi-provider fallback strategy.

plugins.name: sys-macos-network-ports-diagnostics
plugins.description: Local-only network and listening-port diagnostics without public-IP egress.

plugins.name: sys-macos-process-observability
plugins.description: Runtime process diagnostics with privacy-minimized defaults and optional path-level forensics.

plugins.name: sys-macos-remove-quarantine
plugins.description: Inspect and remove macOS quarantine attributes from trusted files and directories.

plugins.name: sys-macos-screenshot
plugins.description: FastMCP 3.x screenshot server for smart window capture, region capture, and macOS permission diagnostics.

plugins.name: sys-macos-storage-diagnostics
plugins.description: Disk capacity, partition usage, and storage IO diagnostics for system health triage.

plugins.name: sys-macos-sublime-home-end-keys
plugins.description: Fix Home/End key behavior in Sublime Text on macOS for line-level navigation.

plugins.name: sys-macos-sysinfo
plugins.description: FastMCP system diagnostics server for macOS, Linux, and Windows with focused tools for summary, hardware, network, storage, processes, ports, and full reports.

plugins.name: sys-macos-system-summary
plugins.description: Baseline machine identity and hardware diagnostics for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

plugins.name: sys-macos-windows-cross-compile
plugins.description: Set up MinGW-w64 on macOS to cross-compile C/C++ binaries for Windows.

plugins.name: sys-macos-wine-setup
plugins.description: Install and verify Wine, XQuartz, and Winetricks on macOS.

plugins.name: sys-win-disable-windows-ai
plugins.description: Disable Windows 11 AI features including Copilot, Recall, Edge AI, and app-level AI integrations.

plugins.name: sys-win-docker-cleanup
plugins.description: Cross-platform Docker cleanup workflow with safe prune steps and Windows WSL2 VHDX compaction guidance.

plugins.name: sys-win-elevation
plugins.description: Run elevated Windows commands while preserving visible stdout/stderr using inline sudo or gsudo.

plugins.name: sys-win-system-elevation
plugins.description: Run Windows commands as NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM using Task Scheduler with file-based output capture.

plugins.name: webhook-discord-notifier
plugins.description: Send Discord channel alerts via webhook with profile-based secret resolution and validation.
